Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.command

Interface Command

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WeaponCommand
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoneCommand, GrabCommand, GrabTileCommand, MoveCommand, PayReloadBeforeShotCommand, PayReloadWeaponCommand, PayScopeCommand, PayWeaponCommand, PayWeaponOptionCommand, RespawnCommand, SelectAggregateActionCommand, SelectAmmoPaymentCommand, SelectBuyingWeaponCommand, SelectDiscardedWeaponCommand, SelectPaymentCommand, SelectPowerUpCommand, SelectPowerUpPaymentCommand, SelectReloadingWeaponCommand, SelectScopeCommand, SelectShootActionCommand, SelectTargetPlayerCommand, SelectTargetSquareCommand, SelectWeaponCommand, SelectWeaponModeCommand, ShootCommand, UseNewtonCommand, UseScopeCommand, UseTagbackGrenadeCommand, UseTeleportCommand
    public interface Command
    This interface must be implemented by every command. The command pattern is a behavioral design pattern. This pattern encapsulates in an object all the data required for performing a given action (command).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CommandMessage createCommandMessage()
      Create the command message that describes this command
      void execute()
      Executes the command
      boolean isUndoable()
      Gets if it is possible to undo the command
      void undo()
      Backward execution of execute() It restores the previous state.
